description: Allows the user to view the hospital call center dashboard.
Allows the user to add, edit, or deactivate agents in the call center.
Allows the user to view the details of call center agents.
Allows the user to access and review call logs and call data.
Allows the user to listen to recorded calls for quality assurance.
Allows the user to generate and create reports on agent performance and call metrics.
Allows the user to view existing reports and statistics.
Allows the user to assign or modify roles within the system.
Allows the user to modify system configurations and settings.
Allows the user to access patient information associated with calls.
Allows the user to escalate calls to higher authority when needed.
